custom-sql.sql: SELECT opencps_dossierfile.* FROM opencps_dossierfile WHERE (opencps_dossierfile.dossierId = ?) AND (opencps_deliverable.fileTemplateNo = ?) AND length(formData) > 0 ORDER BY opencps_dossierfile.dossierId DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT opencps_stepconfig.* FROM opencps_stepconfig WHERE opencps_stepconfig.stepType >= ? ORDER BY opencps_stepconfig.stepCode ASC
